name: Atmospheric Escape
description:
Description

Earth is in ruin, you slept in whilst everyone evacuated! Luckily you've got a homemade rocket and a can-do attitude, try and try again to get out and into space. Look out for falling debris, depending on what it is it could help or hinder you.

Make your Atmospheric Escape!

Credits

All done by me :)

...Except the background music, got those tracks royalty free from https://rob0ne.bandcamp.com/album/digital-odyssey

Have Fun!
